snippet: Zach Werenski and Ivan Provorov are the latest to put cracks in the time-tested theory that defensemen need a long time to develop....
lead_paragraph: Zach Werenski and Ivan Provorov are the latest to put cracks in the time-tested theory that defensemen need a long time to develop.

headline.main: Elite Young Defensemen Adapting to NHL Faster Than Ever
headline.print_headline: Elite Young Defensemen Adapting to NHL Faster Than Ever
